thread.section_title: Scientifics Online Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Scientifics Online | scientificsonline.com
thread.title: DJ

author: DJ
title: DJ
text: So, I purchased an item that was reviewed by Matt Granit...I bought it for my daughters birthday present and so she could use it for her classes. Scientific said it was shipped, we did not receive it...and they couldn't prove delivery. Rather than take care of the issue Scientific screwed around, I had to put the purchase in dispurpte and find another simular item. They don't make it easy to buy from, they don't make it easy to work with...in short they don't care about the Customer.
